lexUnit.name: break.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: separate or cause to separate into pieces as a result of a blow, shock, or strain.

sentence.text: Josef Jakobs landed in a potato field in North Stifford , Essex , falling heavily and breaking his ankle .
Amelie fell and broke her hip just two days before they were due to sail on the liner for France .
When she got over the stroke she fell and broke her hand .
On the other hand , if I did slip and break my hip I should no doubt be dead by the morning .
About this time Mrs Foskett slipped on the floor and broke her hip , dying shortly afterwards .
The facts are : Lady Eleanor kept to herself , put on her cloak to go for a walk and , in the half-light , slipped on the staircase at Godstowe , fell and broke her neck . "
Clary tripped over a cable during filming and broke his foot .
At every step they fall back , foxed and flummoxed by the snow , tripping over buried buckets , breaking their shins on hidden cobbles .
David Riley had safely negotiated the slide and a climbing frame when he tripped on scattered pieces of safety surfacing , breaking a bone in his lower right arm .
A Sherpa also broke his ankle .
Hunt , who broke an ankle at the start of this season , said : ` This is a good opportunity for me to show what I can do after a bit of a difficult time . "
A BURGLAR broke his ankles when he leapt out of what he thought was a first-floor window at Bristol — and fell four storeys .
I was going to be a pro racer and was doing real good until , at thirteen , I was goofing around and broke my arm . "
Loughlin , out until Christmas , broke his arm playing for Great Britain against New South Wales Country , and Saints have been told that insurance does not cover players on international duty .
Trevor Miles broke his left arm in three places when he was pushed into a wall by some boys at school .
The most unusual item offered in the auction is the special lightweight wrist-brace which Jackie wore after he broke a bone in his wrist in an F2 race at Jarama .
Eldon Brown 's 40-year-old victim broke her pelvis , ankle and four bones in her back , after jumping from a fourth floor window to escape him .
He broke both bones in his right forearm and will be in plaster for eight weeks .
A client who has severe arthritis broke her hip .
He broke his hip whilst hunting and the poor man walked with a limp from then on .
` My father even used to play , until he broke his hip earlier this year . "
And last month an 18-year-old student at Lady Margaret Hall college broke a leg and injured her spine when she fell out of a window after a pub crawl .
JONJO O'Neill 's stable star Danny Connors had to be put down after breaking a leg at Kelso yesterday .
Graham turned to sailing after breaking a leg climbing .
He broke his neck by throwing himself down on top of the reactor . "
There must be some height , call it h , such that an animal would just break its neck if it fell from that height , but would just survive if it fell from a slightly lower height .
She broke her neck in a car accident 5 years ago .
Fourth Division leaders Southend may face Scarborough without Bennett , who broke his nose in a two-goal display against Tottenham .
Collins replaces London 's Michael Watson , who broke his nose while sparring .
He broke his nose early on in his spell here and was loath to get stuck in .

Apart from a 10% collapsed lung , Lester broke two ribs and his left collarbone .
World Champion Jan Kellner broke his rib during the squirt competition the day before .

I saw Macca interviewed on Grandstand and when asked about it , he said with a smile that he broke his wrist in a ` freak accident " , but would n't say anything more .

In the return match in 1902 , Fitzsimmons was beaten in eight rounds after breaking his right hand trying to knock Jeffries out .
He affected a limp because one leg was ` full of shrapnel " ( he broke it falling downstairs during a party ) .
One day I darted out of his way and he broke his hand on the settee .
A COMPANY has been fined more than £2,000 after two of its workers broke their hands on unprotected lathe machines .
West Indies captain Richie Richardson , who will play for Northern League club Blackpool in the coming season , broke a finger during Leeward Islands ' Red Stripe Cup match against Windward Islands .
